concept.title: Use This Space to Add Your Material
concept.shortdesc: Welcome to your little slice of ePublisher Express Trial. This is your “My Edits” section. In this section, you will be able to add your content and then see it in the generated output.

conbody.p: By now you should have a little bit of an idea of how ePublisher works. The trial is generating output from pre-built stationery synchronized to the ePublisher Express Trial project.This document and the others have been imported to the Express project and appear in the Documents window.

When you press the generation button, ePublisher opens each document and reads the information contained within. ePublisher will never change the source documents, it reads them for the content and the style names. We have customized the stationary to these source documents. Once you purchase a seat of ePublisher, you will be able to customize a project to your styles. This process is a detail in ePublisher Designer. For now, have some fun with the styles and space below we have provided for you. We left everything simple, so feel free to use some of the skills you just learned in the previous document. You can create related topics, expand/collapse sections, or add some mini Table of Contents. Remember to edit in this document and use the style names provided in the output class. Once done, just save the file and publish with one click to see the results.
If you are performing the task for the Search Showcase, here would be a good place to put the links the task requested
